survey_brief: This survey aims to understand traveler preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable tourism practices to help businesses adopt eco-friendly initiatives.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainability when choosing travel accommodations?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure importance. Ensure options are randomized for bias reduction.

script.question_text: How important is sustainability when choosing travel accommodations?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices do you actively seek when traveling? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if respondent selects 'Extremely important' or 'Very important' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections but include an explicit 'None of the above' option.

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from choosing sustainable travel options?
